author: Michael Madrusan
description: The original recipe calls for a full 2oz (60ml) bottled-in-bond straight rye (without the optional extra splash of water to help with dilution). Just 1/3oz (10ml) less whiskey produces a more approachable but still spirit-forward late-night sipper.
name: Sunset Park
recipeIngredient: 50 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
